property_title: Beachfront Flat in Potamos Yermasoyias, Yermasoyia, Limassol
property_description: Fully renovated flat, in a renovated and well maintained building, boasting a garden, an outdoor pool and tranquil sea views! This beach front flat is fully air-conditioned and guests benefit from a communal pool and an exceptional location with countless amenities nearby!
property_excerpt: Fully renovated flat, in a renovated and well maintained building, boasting a garden, an outdoor pool and tranquil sea views! This beach front flat is fully air-conditioned and guests benefit from a communal pool and an exceptional location with countless amenities nearby!

property_title: Prime sea view luxury in Ayios Athanasios, Limassol
property_description: This unobstructed sea-view apartment is presented through stunning architecture, boasting luxury common facilities such as a swimming pool, gym and sauna. Deluxe floors in each room, marble floors and walls in toilets & bathrooms, high ceilings (3.50), high-quality kitchen cabinets and wardrobes from Italy are provided.The property is defined by premium living and top-end finishes, in one of the most desirable areas of Limassol.

property_title: Tranquil Luxury Penthouse in Ayios Athanasios, Limassol
property_description: A stunning new private estate of apartment residences, offering a modern and truly luxurious environment. Surrounded by tranquil landscaped gardens, generous terracing, relaxation & entertainment areas and outdoor pool. Designed to feel part of the vibrant town centre but with the utmost privacy in mind. The complex consists of two buildings made up of 1, 2 & 3 bedroom apartments, and 3 & 4 bedroom Deluxe Penthouses offering private roof top pool and unobstructed sea views.

property_title: Sustainable Penthouse in Aradippou, Larnaca
property_description: In this amazing new project, you will find the quality of life you were searching for. In an immense plot tranquility, safety and luxury are guaranteed. Consisting of three residential blocks, in a space of almost 8.000sqm, you will be living in a Green environment with respect to nature. Ideal location, at the crossroads between the city center of Larnaca and the main highway network linking Larnaca with the other cities in Cyprus, close to Larnaka stadium, St. George church, the new Metropolis Mall, Pascal English School, and numerous colleges.
